data.title: New Packaging and Labeling Resources Available
data.excerpt: The California Department of Public Health (CDPH) has released new resources to assist cannabis manufacturers and other businesses in understanding and evaluating compliance with packaging and labeling requirements.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
